item.description:
On February 26th, Blues Cafe will be bringing you a full evening of blues dancing and performances, in conjunction with the weekend-long blues workshops with Tim O’Neill from LA. This Blues Cafe will feature DJs Devona Cartier and Christine Moser playing their favorite blues tunes all evening.

The evening will also include a blues demo by Tim O’Neill.

New to dancing? We’ll have a beginner blues lesson from 8-9pm (taught by Tim O’Neill and Amanda Gruhl), which is included in the price of admission. No partner or experience necessary : )

Also included in the price of admission are water, coffee, tea, cookies, and other baked goodies.

As always, dress to impress! Bust out those dresses/hats/shoes/cufflinks you’ve been meaning to wear. ; ) And hair flowers for Floweruary!

 

Lesson 8-9pm

Dancing 9pm-12:30am

 

$15 regular

$12 students & seniors

 

located at Springstep:

98 George P. Hassett Dr

Medford, MA
item.why: Go to Blues Cafe on Saturday for a full night of blues dancing. There will be a beginner lesson, performances, and plenty of baked goodies.

group.name: The Boston-Area Swing/Blues Dance Meetup Group

item.name: True Blues at Blues Cafe
